sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_982322_technic_1_sosqtdsr"> <x_982322_technic_1_sosqtdsr action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <c_dos_constatation_la>Warranty Documents : Claim number N° SAGAI : VAAIA3601 Complementary Information : Hello, Please find attached the preapproval simulation before the repair. Total costs of claim 737.88 euro. With kind regards, Calin Internet Browser : Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/110.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/110.0.1587.57</c_dos_constatation_la> <c_dos_d_dos_rappel>2023-02-28 08:06:36</c_dos_d_dos_rappel> <c_dos_dam/> <c_dos_diagnostique_la/> <c_dos_emaildiag_emetteur>IORGA CALIN (+40212077730)</c_dos_emaildiag_emetteur> <c_dos_ferm_cause_id>4</c_dos_ferm_cause_id> <c_dos_grp_fermeture/> <c_dos_incident_reproduit/> <c_dos_la>EN</c_dos_la> <c_dos_odo_id>1</c_dos_odo_id> <c_dos_odometre>0</c_dos_odometre> <c_dos_odometre_fin_gar/> <c_dos_ouv_cause_id/> <c_dos_plateforme_fermeture/> <c_dos_remede_la/> <c_dos_rep_fermeture/> <c_dos_solution_la>Good day, Thank you for your message. The provided documentation/information will be considered during the assessment of the claim. We will request further information if necessary. If your credit claim is in status A, please analyse the anomalies on the SAGAI page S55A, please correct those which can be corrected and please fill the COM1 line with the modifications you carried out. If the anomalies cannot be corrected, please fill the COM1 line with additional information for us (COM1 should always be filled). If this ticket was submitted to deliver requested documentation/information, please make sure the claim doesn't remain in A* status filling COM 3 line. This channel is dedicated to providing supporting documents for claims awaiting a decision. Requests for assistance to correct an anomaly or to re-evaluate the Credit Claim decision, should be addressed to “Help & Contact > Contact us > Warranty > Enquiries/ Other Information. Best regards,</c_dos_solution_la> <c_dos_st_id>0</c_dos_st_id> <c_dos_symptome_ppd_la/> <c_dos_vin>W0VZCYHZ0LS021316</c_dos_vin> <c_grp_creation>N1</c_grp_creation> <c_grp_maj>N1</c_grp_maj> <c_grp_proprietaire>N1</c_grp_proprietaire> <c_marque_id>OV</c_marque_id> <c_plateforme_creation>GIM</c_plateforme_creation> <c_plateforme_maj>GIM</c_plateforme_maj> <c_plateforme_proprietaire>GIM</c_plateforme_proprietaire> <c_pour_action_id/> <c_pour_info_id>0</c_pour_info_id> <c_priorite_id>1</c_priorite_id> <c_rep_creation>EMAILDIAG</c_rep_creation> <c_rep_proprietaire>EMAILDIAG</c_rep_proprietaire> <c_type_appel_id>11</c_type_appel_id> <c_veh_transforme/> <c_vehicule_id>1GUO</c_vehicule_id> <change_dt>2023-03-01 15:26:00</change_dt> <change_uid/> <d_creation>2023-02-28 08:06:36</d_creation> <d_dos_1ere_action/> <d_dos_deb_garantie/> <d_dos_fermeture>2023-03-01 15:26:00</d_dos_fermeture> <d_dos_fin_garantie/> <d_dos_pf_arrivee>2023-02-28 08:06:36</d_dos_pf_arrivee> <d_dos_reouverture/> <d_dos_statut>2023-03-01 15:26:00</d_dos_statut> <d_proprietaire/> <date_de_la_preced_interve/> <delais_dapparition/> <domage_corporel/> <domage_description/> <domage_tiers/> <i_info_complementaire/> <i_plainte_client/> <incident_reproduit/> <intervention/> <n_branch_pointer>7196</n_branch_pointer> <n_client_id>RO00010</n_client_id> <n_contact_id>SOS11091568</n_contact_id> <n_dos_id>15826418</n_dos_id> <n_item_id/> <ntsbou_code_campagne/> <recidive/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-11-17 20:42:31</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c76948ce976ab110601fb998c253af0b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-11-17 20:42:31</sys_updated_on> <unite_delais/> <v_accident/> <v_date_reparation/> <v_type_client/> <vehicule_immobilise/> <vehicule_remorque/> </x_982322_technic_1_sosqtdsr> </record_update>
